title: Tomato chilli chutney
ingredients: ['450g tomatoes, roughly diced', '4 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '1cm piece root ginger, peeled and minced', '2 fresh chillies, seeded and finely chopped', '2 tablespoons Thai fish sauce', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '4 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons brown sugar']
